revised_title: The Role of Cytochrome and Intracellular Oxidase in Cellular Respiration
tldr: The author explores the properties and functions of cytochrome and intracellular oxidase in cellular respiration. They describe the extraction and preparation of these components from yeast and their role in the oxidation and reduction of cytochrome within living cells. The study provides insights into the respiratory mechanisms of cells and the behavior of oxidase and cytochrome in both artificial and living systems.
